Privacy.title: Privacy & Security Policy
Privacy.subtitle: Your privacy and security are our top priorities
Privacy.introduction: Welcome to Drooby. This Privacy & Security Policy explains how we collect, use, protect, and share your personal information when you use our AI-powered shopping comparison platform. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your data in compliance with Saudi Arabian and GCC data protection regulations.
Privacy.introduction2: By using Drooby, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at
Privacy.informationWeCollectContent: We collect information that you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us. This includes your name, email address, phone number, shipping address, and payment information. We also collect information automatically when you use our platform, including device information, IP address, browser type, and usage data.
Privacy.howWeUseYourInformationContent: We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, send you updates about your orders, respond to your inquiries, personalize your experience, and send you marketing communications (with your consent). We also use your information for security purposes and to comply with legal obligations.
Privacy.dataSharingDisclosureContent: We may share your information with trusted partners and service providers who assist us in operating our platform, processing payments, and delivering products. We do not sell your personal information. We may disclose your information if required by law or to protect our rights and the safety of our users.
Privacy.yourRightsChoicesContent: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can manage your privacy settings in your account, opt-out of marketing communications, and request a copy of your data. You also have the right to object to certain processing activities and to file a complaint with the relevant data protection authority.
Privacy.dataSecurityContent: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information, including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
Privacy.dataRetentionContent: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. When we no longer need your information, we will securely delete or anonymize it.
Privacy.accountSecurity1: Use a strong, unique password for your account
Privacy.accountSecurity2: Never share your login credentials with anyone
Privacy.accountSecurity4: Regularly review your active sessions and log out from unused devices
Privacy.accountSecurity5: Be cautious of phishing attempts and suspicious emails
Privacy.accountSecurity6: Keep your contact information up-to-date for security notifications
Privacy.safeShopping1: Verify that you're shopping on the official Drooby partner store
Privacy.safeShopping2: Check for secure connection indicators (HTTPS and padlock icon)
Privacy.safeShopping3: Review seller and product ratings before making a purchase
Privacy.safeShopping4: Use secure payment methods and avoid sharing payment details via email
Privacy.safeShopping5: Keep records of your transactions and order confirmations
Privacy.safeShopping6: Report any suspicious activity or unauthorized transactions immediately
Privacy.howWeUseCookiesContent: Drooby uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your user experience, remember your preferences, and analyze how you use our platform. Cookies are small text files that help us provide personalized recommendations and improve our services.
Privacy.essentialCookiesDesc: Required for basic site functionality, authentication, and security. These cannot be disabled.
Privacy.performanceCookiesDesc: Help us understand how you interact with our platform to improve performance and user experience.
Privacy.marketingCookiesDesc: Used to deliver relevant advertisements and track campaign effectiveness. You can opt-out of these.
Privacy.sdaiaContent: Drooby complies with the Personal Data Protection Law (PDPL) of Saudi Arabia and regulations set by SDAIA.
Privacy.gccDataProtection: We adhere to data protection standards across GCC countries.
Privacy.internationalStandards: Our practices align with international privacy standards, including GDPR principles.
Privacy.questionsDescription: If you have any questions about this Privacy & Security Policy or how we handle your data, please contact our Privacy Team.

HelpCenter.title: Help Center
HelpCenter.subtitle: Find answers to commonly asked questions about Drooby.
HelpCenter.faq1: What is Drooby and how does it work?
HelpCenter.faq1Answer: Drooby is an AI-powered shopping comparison platform that helps you find the best prices and deals across multiple stores. Simply search for a product, and Drooby will show you prices from various retailers, helping you save money and make informed purchasing decisions.
HelpCenter.faq2Answer: Drooby supports a wide range of popular online stores and retailers. We continuously add new stores to our platform to provide you with more options. You can see the list of supported stores in the app or on our website.
HelpCenter.faq3Answer: Yes, Drooby is completely free to use. There are no subscription fees or hidden charges. We earn revenue through partnerships with retailers, which allows us to offer this service at no cost to you.
HelpCenter.faq4Answer: You can earn points by making purchases through Drooby, referring friends, completing tasks, and participating in special promotions. Points can be redeemed for cashback, discounts, and other rewards.
HelpCenter.faq5: How can I redeem my points?
HelpCenter.faq5Answer: You can redeem your points through the Wallet section in your profile. Points can be converted to cashback, used for discounts on purchases, or exchanged for coupons and special offers.
HelpCenter.faq6Answer: Points typically expire after 12 months of inactivity. However, as long as you continue to use Drooby and earn or redeem points, your points will remain active. We'll notify you before your points are about to expire.
HelpCenter.faq7: Can I transfer points to another user?
HelpCenter.faq7Answer: Currently, points are non-transferable between accounts. Points are tied to your account and cannot be shared or transferred to other users.
HelpCenter.faq8: How accurate are the price comparisons?
HelpCenter.faq8Answer: We strive to provide the most accurate and up-to-date price information. Our system regularly updates prices from partner stores. However, prices may change quickly, so we recommend verifying the final price on the retailer's website before making a purchase.
HelpCenter.faq9: Can I purchase directly through Drooby?
HelpCenter.faq9Answer: Drooby is a comparison platform that redirects you to the retailer's website to complete your purchase. We don't process payments directly, but we track your purchases to ensure you receive your points and cashback.
HelpCenter.faq10: How does the AI chat comparison work?
HelpCenter.faq10Answer: Our AI chat feature allows you to ask questions about products, compare options, and get personalized recommendations. Simply type your question, and our AI will provide detailed comparisons and suggestions based on your preferences.
HelpCenter.faq11Answer: You can find available coupons in the Coupons section. Click on a coupon to view its details and terms. When you're ready to use it, click 'Apply' and you'll be redirected to the store with the coupon code automatically applied.
HelpCenter.faq12: Can I use multiple coupons on one purchase?
HelpCenter.faq12Answer: This depends on the store's policy. Some stores allow stacking multiple coupons, while others only accept one coupon per transaction. Check the coupon terms and conditions for specific details.
HelpCenter.faq13: What if my coupon doesn't work?
HelpCenter.faq13Answer: If a coupon doesn't work, please check that it hasn't expired, meets the minimum purchase requirement, and is valid for the items in your cart. If the issue persists, contact our support team for assistance.
HelpCenter.faq14Answer: Yes, we take your privacy and security seriously. We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your data. For more details, please review our Privacy & Security Policy in your profile settings.
HelpCenter.faq15: How do I delete my account?
HelpCenter.faq15Answer: To delete your account, go to Profile > Privacy & Security, and you'll find the option to delete your account. Please note that this action is permanent and cannot be undone. All your data, points, and purchase history will be deleted.
HelpCenter.faq16: Can I change my registered email or phone number?
HelpCenter.faq16Answer: Yes, you can update your email and phone number in your Profile settings. Go to Profile > Account settings to make these changes. You may need to verify your new email or phone number for security purposes.
HelpCenter.stillNeedHelpDesc: Our support team is here to assist you.
